message.raw:
Make examples separate cmake projects

The examples were being built by default, but they use find_package(ignition-rendering0 REQUIRED).
This fails on the first build because the examples are build before the cmake config file is
installed. This commit makes the examples separate cmake projects and disables building them by
default.
